message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to showcase this product to you. I believe it holds immense value, and I'm offering it to you at $2,000,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $2,000,000 is out of my price range. I'm interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $1,000,000 at this time.
Bob, I understand your perspective. However, the value this product offers is substantial. I'm willing to come down to $1,750,000, demonstrating my commitment to finding common ground.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $1,750,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1,200,000.  Let's meet in the middle.
Bob, I appreciate you coming up on your offer. It shows you recognize the value this product brings. Let's bridge the gap - how about we settle at $1,550,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
Alice, I'm happy to see we're getting closer.  However, $1,550,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1,300,000.  If you're willing to meet in the middle, we can reach a deal.
